alert.note: Alert for Columbia; McDuffie (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of McDuffie and southwestern Columbia Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 240 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Thomson, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grovetown, Thomson, Harlem, Appling, Thomson-McDuffie County Airport, Dearing, Liberty Park Community Center, Sweetwater Park, Winfield, Arties Pond Public Fishing Area, McDuffie County Fire Department, Adamsville, Thomson Fire Department, McDuffie Regional Medical Center, University Hospital McDuffie, White Oak Campground, Autney, Boneville, Columbia County Jail and Carpenter Airport. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 167 and 187. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
